title: Intro to Perform Studies
description: An examination of the origins of the field of performance studies in literary study of theatre and drama, anthropological investigations of ritual, and sociological analyses of performance in everyday life.

prerequisites: ENGL 1102 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
